page.title: 15ADULT LEISURE,TRENCH TELFORD
page.content: The 31 children in Class 4 conducted a survey of their parents' hobbies and interests. None of the parents were involved in any educational pursuits and only 50% participated in any form of organised activity.Most preferred to be doing things on their own or with their families.Walking,jogging and swimming were popular with the energetic.Several parents went riding, fishing or iceskating, played darts or badminton,went to Yoga .One mum has recently started having tap-dancing lessons.Many mums preferred more conventional hobbies and enjoyed needlework,knitting,crochet and cooking.Making beer and wine, breeding animals and tropical fish, playing snooker and darts kept the fathers busy!The parents were involved in a total of 26 different activities.No one seems to have much time for TV!
